name: Holy Locket
description: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.

abilities.name: Energy Charge
abilities.description: Instantly heals and and replenishes the target allied hero's health and mana per accumulated charge.
notes: Has a recharge time of 8 seconds, that is fully affected by cooldown reductions
Cooldown resetting effects restore all charges immediately
Additionally, also gains a charge whenever a visible enemy casts an ability nearby
All current charges on Magic Wand are carried over when upgraded to a Holy Locket
Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities
The caster does not require to face the target in order to cast it on them
Can only be cast on heroes, including illusions and creep-heroes
Gains 1 charge for each ability cast by an enemy
Does not gain charges from active attack modifiers, toggle-able abilities, other sources, active abilities that are procced passively, abilities cast out of invisibility
Can heal and mana restore up to 340 with max charges

abilities.name: Holy Blessing
abilities.description: Grants the wielder outgoing heal amplification, boosting all healing they provide.
notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of heal amplification
Neither grants health regen amplification, lifesteal amplification, nor spell lifesteal amplification
All healing provided by the wielder is amplified, regardless of the target
Multiple instances of Holy Blessing do not stack

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 198 health and 0.9 health regeneration
108 mana, 0.45 mana regeneration and 0.9% flat base magic resistance
9 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
12.15 main attack damage to universal heroes
